title: [New Champion: Ornn] What do you make of the background text in the teaser?
body:
[EDIT: bad link, the pic isn't readable. Try this one:  http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/images/path-to-en_us.jpg&resize=1400: ]

A new teaser just came out about the next new champion: Ornn, the Mountain-Smith.

It's a beautiful song in Ancient Freljordian, with a picture of a scroll with the lyrics in English. But what interests me more is that we can see a few words from the pages **behind** the lyrics. What do y'all make of it?

There is a mentions of "Three S...", which should obviously be the Three Sisters Lissandra, Avarossa and what's-her-name, the old leaders from the three Freljord factions.

They, or maybe just one of them, apparently made a contract with Ornn, and a Bridge is mentioned. Given that the song also mentions the Howling Abyss, it seems reasonable to think that Ornn created the Bridge above the Howling Abyss, but for what reason? That isn't clear yet.

This reminds me of a lot of old Norse myths, I'm super excited.

Other noteworthy tidbits:

* Apparently Ornn leaked some knowledge he shouldn't have to "they". Still the three sisters? Or maybe "they" as "the people in one of the factions"?
* After that, he went East, across the Great Sea? To Ionia? I need a cartographer! 
* We have half a word, "Mer-K...". I've no idea of what it could be. Anyone knows a word starting with those letters?
* We have a mention of "sea-bottom" and of using *something* to "rule his kingdom". I don't think it's talking about Ornn's Kingdom here, so I'd guess that something happened to Ornn during his travel, and one of his belongings has been distorted from his original purpose. Maybe by another tribe of under-water Vastaya?

Keep at it people, let's speculate ^^

P.S.: and sorry, I can't resist, but I was right :p https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/xuGbZzpf-next-champion-is-a-blacksmith-i-called-it-first-p
